page.p: Add tag is for text insertions
Column break to indicate a break between columns
Date December 9, 2020 to indicate a date, with an attribute of when
Figure tag drawing or graph here to indicate a figure or illustration in the text
Footnote This is a footnote contains the body of a footnote within the original document. This tag should be placed where the footnote marker appears in the text.
Gap page is torn for missing text

Heading
for headings (similar to using wiki heading mark-up)
Stamp stamp here for stamps on envelopes
Unclear for text that is difficult to read
Strike through or s or str for struck through text
Superscript sup or hi rend=sup for superscript text
Expan expanded text for expanding abbreviations, for example: quatorsiemes
Reg regularized text for regularizing text
a soft break tag. In non-verbatim exports, combines the end of the line with the beginning of the next when a word is broken across the lines.
Marginalia marginalia here for noting marginalia
